about_the_game:
Take on the new world

Embark on a violent adventure in a new world, battling the unfriendly monster residents that call it home. Remember, time is of the essence; dawdle too long and the locals will double their efforts to end your journey prematurely!

Brutal Boss battles

if you battle with courage and gear up wisely, you just might stake your claim as the top dog by vanquishing the big bosses lurking at each level.

Wanna talk to the developer

Join the Official Discord! (linked in the info section)
I'm more than happy to talk to anyone who plays my games, if I'm not loitering in the Voice channel, just type a message in any channel and I'll be there.
If you have any feedback or ideas, I'm happy to listen.
detailed_description:
Take on the new world

Embark on a violent adventure in a new world, battling the unfriendly monster residents that call it home. Remember, time is of the essence; dawdle too long and the locals will double their efforts to end your journey prematurely!

Brutal Boss battles

if you battle with courage and gear up wisely, you just might stake your claim as the top dog by vanquishing the big bosses lurking at each level.

Wanna talk to the developer

Join the Official Discord! (linked in the info section)
I'm more than happy to talk to anyone who plays my games, if I'm not loitering in the Voice channel, just type a message in any channel and I'll be there.
If you have any feedback or ideas, I'm happy to listen.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 2.0 brewmaster
  • Processor: 2 core 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0 holo
  • Processor: 4 core 3GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: 2 core 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: 4 core 3GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Carnage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 core 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core 3GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Dive into exhilarating combat in this roguelite, top-down shooter where survival is key! Face relentless hordes of monstrous foes, and conquer epic boss battles. Play solo or team up in co-op to race against time and see if you have what it takes to survive this mayhem of blood butts and guts!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
